'use strict';
var stats = window.ttiStats = {};
var addListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('addEventListener' in document) {
document.addEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.attachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var removeListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('removeEventListener' in document) {
document.removeEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.detachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var baseTimeStamp = (new Date()).getTime();
var onClick = function onClick() {
stats.click = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('click', onClick);
};
var onScroll = function onScroll() {
stats.scroll = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('scroll', onScroll);
};
addListener('click', onClick);
addListener('scroll', onScroll);
}());
</script>

<div class="bodyconstraint">
<div class="bodyconstraint-inner">
<div id="features" class="feature_list">
<div id="deals" class="feature odd">
<div class="feature-content">
<h3>Find a deal nearby – tonight</h3>
<p>Just one tap shows you the best rates for tonight at hotels nearby. The perfect place to stay is only minutes away.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cloud" class="feature even">
<div class="feature-content">
<h3>Anytime, anywhere...</h3>
<p>Easily switch between your computer, smartphone and tablet. Just sign in to your Booking.com account and we'll sync your previous searches, viewed hotels, stored credit cards and lots more. Pick up where you left off – on any device.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="feature three last">
<div class="feature-content left">
<h3>Booking is just the beginning</h3>
<p><script type='track_copy' data-hash='ZOMcEcCeLWbVFbIBTZRO'></script>Our apps are designed to help you every step of the way. Check in with your digital confirmation, manage your bookings on the go, and use our travel guides to make the most of your trip!</p>
</div>
<div class="feature-downloads">
<ul>
<li><img src="https://t-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/mobile/apps_landing/b-icon-download-page/58f4b468ae0d655bf523fa85ad882d0661083c16.jpg"></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="feature-content right">
<h3>All the freedom you need</h3>
<p>Our apps give you the flexibility to stop and explore along the way. Find a place to stay at your next stop, add a night or two when you can't bear to leave, or cancel a booking if plans change. Be as free as the open road.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="subsciber_firstname_lightbox" style="display: none;" >
<div class="sf_container">
<div class="uspfield" style="display: block;">
<ul>
<li class="sl_pt_01"><span></span><p><strong>We've negotiated with thousands of hotels</strong> to get the very best deals. We call them Secret Deals and they only last for a limited time.</p></li>
<li class="sl_pt_02"><span></span><p><strong>You can get these deals for free</strong> by subscribing to our newsletters. You can even choose your favorite destinations to receive personalized deals.</p></li>
<li class="sl_pt_03"><span></span><p><strong>Get started now by entering your email address.</strong> We'll instantly send you a link to our Deal Finder!</p></li>
<li class="sl_pt_04"><span></span><p style="padding-bottom: 40px;"><strong>Don't worry – your email address is safe with us.</strong> We'll never share your private information and you can unsubscribe at any time.</p></li>
</ul>
</div>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

Booking is just the beginning Our apps are designed to help you every step of the way. Check in with your digital confirmation, manage your bookings on the go, and use our travel guides to make the most of your trip! All the freedom you need Our apps give you the flexibility to stop and explore along the way. Find a place to stay at your next stop, add a night or two when you can't bear to leave, or cancel a booking if plans change. Be as free as the open road. We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from real, verified guests. How does it work? 1 It starts with a booking The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property. 2 Followed by a trip When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more. 3 And finally, a review After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site. If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.
